title: The American Review of Reviews
aka: Review of Reviews and World's Work

renewed-contributions.title: When Motor Cars Walk the Plank

additional-note: This record is for the New York-based periodical.  It was published as The American Monthly Review of Reviews from 1897 to 1907, The American Review of Reviews from 1907 to 1928, as Review of Reviews and World's Work from 1932 to 1934, and as Review of Reviews from 1890 to 1897, 1929 to 1932, and 1935 to 1937. There were also other magazines titled 'Review of Reviews' published in other countries.
